# PED::SET_PED_COMBAT_MOVEMENT

## Summary
Set the peds movment type during combat

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **COMBAT_MOVEMENT** pedCombatMoveType

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
enum eCombatMovement // 0x4F456B61
{
	CM_Stationary,
	CM_Defensive,
	CM_WillAdvance,
	CM_WillRetreat
};
